summary: Resolved conflicts in .claude-output.json and style.css. Kept HEAD branch PR metadata for .claude-output.json (full filter engine implementation for PR #88). Resolved style.css by adopting origin/main's structure which aligns with the already-merged index.html: uses #filter-bar directly (no .filter-bar-inner wrapper), .year-range-label class, outline-offset for accessibility instead of outline:none, transitions on inputs, ghost-button style for reset, richer .grid-empty with sub-elements, image placeholder styles, and correct #filter-bar selector in responsive media query.
strategyUsed: For .claude-output.json: chose HEAD since it contains the complete PR #88 filter engine metadata (the current branch's work). For style.css: adopted origin/main's #filter-bar all-in-one layout (dropping HEAD's dead .filter-bar-inner rule which has no matching HTML), used origin/main's input styles (better a11y: outline-offset not outline:none, transitions), used .year-range-label to match the HTML, used origin/main's ghost-button for #filter-reset, kept origin/main's richer .grid-empty and image placeholder styles.
